# Change Log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See Conventional Commitsopen in new window for commit guidelines.

# 2.0.0-beta.22open in new window (2021-07-11)

# Bug Fixes

  • bundler-vite: fallback html requests to index.html (close #265open in new window) (665cda3open in new window)
  • markdown: resolve assets links in html img tags (close #254open in new window) (7cbb163open in new window)
  • plugin-active-header-links: update active header link selector (#259open in new window) (adaeed5open in new window)
  • theme-default: break long links on overflow (close #266open in new window) (#273open in new window) (eb970c3open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.21open in new window (2021-07-03)

# Bug Fixes

  • client: avoid duplicate slash after base in withBase util (close #246open in new window) (af9ceffopen in new window)
  • markdown: filter permalink symbol in toc (close #251open in new window) (5a35806open in new window)
  • theme-default: fix nav glitch at exactly 719px screen width (#238open in new window) (3154fbbopen in new window)
  • theme-default: use default cursor on non-link sidebar items (ca22d4fopen in new window)

# Features

  • bundler-vite: avoid global constants being replaced by vite (close #244open in new window) (#245open in new window) (0c86968open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.20open in new window (2021-06-26)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: invoke extendsPageOptions hook in createPage (76292aaopen in new window)

# Features

  • markdown: bump markdown-it-anchor to 8.0.4 (41338f7open in new window)
  • plugin-pwa: bump mitt to 3.0.0 (8e2eb33open in new window)
  • theme-default: refine sidebar config (ea7c4bbopen in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • markdown: markdown.anchor has changed, see changelog of markdown-it-anchor 8.0.0
  • theme-default: isGroup field of sidebar config is removed
  • core: extendsPageOptions now accept page options as the first argument

# 2.0.0-beta.19open in new window (2021-06-19)

# Bug Fixes

  • bundler-vite: resolve client entry url correctly (close #190open in new window) (36babbaopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: sync types of webpack-dev-server 4 (close #208open in new window) (207014bopen in new window)

# Features

  • bundler-webpack: support vue-loader options (5a51912open in new window)
  • theme-default: support activeMatch in navbar config (ab0c6d1open in new window)
  • theme-default: support disabling dark mode (6517ce1open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.18open in new window (2021-06-12)

# Bug Fixes

  • plugin-search: disable default form action on Enter key (#189open in new window) (81b5b24open in new window)
  • plugin-toc: exclude h1 header in toc (5e96641open in new window)
  • theme-default: exclude h1 header in sidebar (280626dopen in new window)
  • theme-default: show outline of toggle-dark-button (bc94de0open in new window)

# Code Refactoring

  • core: drop support for plugin nesting (f7da97fopen in new window)
  • core: resolve page title from markdown env (09d08a4open in new window)

# Features

  • cli: watch dependencies of user config file (b220524open in new window)
  • markdown: add extract-title plugin (e0a1556open in new window)

# Performance Improvements

  • bundler-vite: make server build lighter (a6ddea5open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: a plugin cannot use other plugins anymore
  • core: markdown emoji syntax is not supported in frontmatter title

# 2.0.0-beta.17open in new window (2021-06-04)

# Bug Fixes

  • theme-default: avoid long inline code breaking the layout (#180open in new window) (ada2e2aopen in new window)
  • theme-default: fix error of sidebar resolving (close #185open in new window) (6a96af0open in new window)
  • theme-default: respect root-level custom container config (close #175open in new window) (f2ad5f0open in new window)

# Features

  • core: support multi-level theme inheritance (5df8662open in new window)
  • theme-default: improve a11y of CodeGroup (#163open in new window) (2b76463open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • theme-default: default title of danger container is changed to "DANGER"

# 2.0.0-beta.16open in new window (2021-05-28)

# Bug Fixes

  • plugin-pwa-popup: increase default z-index (67242e8open in new window)
  • theme-default: increase medium-zoom delay (9c92443open in new window)

# Features

  • bundler-vite: configure postcss by default (6197578open in new window)
  • plugin-back-to-top: add z-index variable (3d7d4a4open in new window)
  • plugin-medium-zoom: add more css variables (close #174open in new window) (d717800open in new window)
  • plugin-nprogress: add z-index variable (151e087open in new window)
  • plugin-pwa-popup: add more css variables (3ae6f72open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.15open in new window (2021-05-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • markdown: decode assets link to ensure bundler can find the file (#144open in new window) (d3e5409open in new window)
  • theme-default: handle rotate events on iPad (#150open in new window) (bbdda60open in new window)
  • theme-default: show header anchors when being focused (#164open in new window) (8de5f0fopen in new window)

# Features

  • bundler-webpack: bump webpack-dev-server to 4.0.0-beta.3 (2e86826open in new window)
  • cli: allow setting default app config (41f9dc6open in new window)
  • plugin-search: add --search-bg-color variable (6c778a8open in new window)
  • plugin-search: improve a11y support (#165open in new window) (205aafeopen in new window)
  • theme-default: support dark mode (close #29open in new window) (680e429open in new window)
  • theme-default: support full link for github repo (#152open in new window) (8a5055bopen in new window)
  • theme-default: support Gitee repo (5cad664open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • theme-default: most sass variables are migrated to css variables

# 2.0.0-beta.14open in new window (2021-05-12)

# Bug Fixes

  • bundler-vite: compat with vite 2.3 changes (close #134open in new window) (1370984open in new window)
  • core: avoid mutating theme layouts array (fe27a57open in new window)

# Features

  • core: allow alias and define hook to return a promise (3b3d289open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.13open in new window (2021-05-06)

# Bug Fixes

  • bundler-vite: make site base work in vite dev (close #126open in new window) (d257e01open in new window)
  • core: path of page options should have the highest priority (0fc6fd3open in new window)
  • markdown: ensure ending newline in import code (160df2dopen in new window)

# Features

  • markdown: allow omitting start or end of import code lines range (21bba5copen in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.12open in new window (2021-04-30)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: avoid uri encoded filename (4ff7f3bopen in new window)
  • theme-default: align the font of line numbers with code blocks (close #124open in new window) (#125open in new window) (a3ea87dopen in new window)

# Features

  • core: add deps to page object (83c9aaeopen in new window)
  • core: make filePath available in markdown env (aa52549open in new window)
  • markdown: support import code blocks (close #15open in new window) (fe20cccopen in new window)

# Performance Improvements

  • core: reduce page data and component file size (4c6eea5open in new window)
  • core: reduce routes file size (d926a17open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: pagePath prop of <Content> renamed to pageKey

# 2.0.0-beta.11open in new window (2021-04-28)

# Bug Fixes

  • bundler-vite: make the timestamp of client entry consistent (4bbff4copen in new window)

# Performance Improvements

  • do not register hooks in dev mode for prod-only plugins (d5af139open in new window)
  • specify optimizeDeps for vite dev (0d77331open in new window)
  • core: merge page routes to reduce requests in vite dev (fa2a614open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.10open in new window (2021-04-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • bundler-vite: avoid client code to be optimized or externalized (f8a088dopen in new window)
  • bundler-vite: disable clearScreen in dev by default (e7bfe49open in new window)
  • cli: do not clean cache and temp on restart (047a52copen in new window)
  • client: implement ClientOnly correctly (e27872dopen in new window)
  • client: make hydration work properly (close #123open in new window) (34a5364open in new window)
  • core: allow extendsMarkdown to return a promise (a4be2fdopen in new window)

# Features

  • bundler-vite: bump vite to 2.2.1 to support cacheDir (d7f685bopen in new window)
  • client: support custom layout (c32866dopen in new window)
  • markdown: support externalIcon in config and frontmatter (#122open in new window) (d1389bcopen in new window)
  • plugin-search: add search plugin (close #35open in new window) (70bb066open in new window)
  • theme-default: compat with docsearch and search plugin (cb00182open in new window)
  • theme-default: support pageClass frontmatter (close #118open in new window) (809d575open in new window)
  • theme-default: support sidebarDepth (b79ba90open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.9open in new window (2021-04-21)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: allow plugin itself as an item of plugin config array (1fa8903open in new window)
  • core: ensure trailing slash of page path (close #114open in new window) (cbcf166open in new window)
  • markdown: do not escape extracted headers (close #117open in new window) (81b1336open in new window)
  • plugin-back-to-top: fix back-to-top styles (933643aopen in new window)
  • theme-default: remove font-smothing in code block (41c281eopen in new window)

# Code Refactoring

  • core: move evergreen option to bundler-webpack (58c30c1open in new window)

# Features

  • client: provide client types file (89a32b5open in new window)
  • core: make frontmatter available in markdown env (f977192open in new window)
  • plugin-palette: add watchers for palette and style files (0cf1b9bopen in new window)
  • plugin-register-components: add register components plugin (close #112open in new window) (6af204dopen in new window)
  • theme-default: add more palette variables for code styles (db8e0f4open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: evergreen option is moved to bundlerConfig.evergreen for bundler-webpack

# 2.0.0-beta.8open in new window (2021-04-11)

# Bug Fixes

  • plugin-docsearch: provide default value for locales (close #107open in new window) (491eb64open in new window)
  • plugin-pwa-popup: provide default value for locales (f7cbc15open in new window)

# Code Refactoring

  • normalize themes and plugins structure (7781172open in new window)
  • core: resolve theme when creating app (fa683cbopen in new window)

# Features

  • markdown: support internalTag option in links plugin (1872ad9open in new window)
  • utils: add logger.createError method (0c198d7open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • client API that provided by plugins should be imported from plugin-foo/lib/client
  • core: theme plugins could be overridden by user plugins now
